heading: editor's note
subheading: wired news — stag4.wired.com — is back. on 30 june, lycos inc. officially became the parent company of wired digital, which includes wired news. beginning monday, readers were redirected to wired.lycos.com/news. after considerable feedback, the change to the url was undone. the editorial integrity and policy of wired news has been unaffected by its partnership […]
author: wired blogs
text: wired news -- stag4.wired.com -- is back. on 30 june, lycos inc. officially became the parent company of wired digital, which includes wired news.beginning monday, readers were redirected to wired.lycos.com/news.after considerable feedback, the change to the url was undone.the editorial integrity and policy of wired news has been unaffected by its partnership with lycos inc.
